item.title: Isa add a quote by Calderon de la Barca
item.description: "¿Qué es la vida? Un frenesí. ¿Qué es la vida? Una ilusión, una sombra, una ficción; y el mayor bien es pequeño; que toda la vida es sueño, y los sueños, sueños son." -- Calderon de la Barca

item.title: Isa add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Some day you will be old enough to start reading fairy tales again." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Isa add a quote by William Nicholson
item.description: "We read to know we're not alone." -- William Nicholson

item.title: Isa add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description:
"Juliet: Saints do not move, though grant for prayers' sake.
Romeo: Then move not, while my prayer's effect I take. Thus from my lips, by yours, my sin is purged.
Juliet: Then have my lips the sin that they have took.
Romeo: Sin from thy lips? O trespass sweetly urged! Give me my sin again." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Isa add a quote by Francisco de Quevedo
item.description: "Polvo serán, mas polvo enamorado." -- Francisco de Quevedo
